law.catch_line: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Area" means a geographic area in one or more political subdivisions in the State described by a closed perimeter boundary.
"Business entity" means a person that operates or conducts a trade or business.

"Enterprise zone" means an area:
that meets the requirements of § 5-704(a) of this subtitle and is designated as an enterprise zone by the Secretary under § 5-704(b) of this subtitle;
designated as an enterprise zone by the United States government under 42 U.S.C. §§ 11501 through 11505; or
designated as an empowerment zone or enterprise community by the United States government under 26 U.S.C. §§ 1391 through 1397F.
"Focus area" means an area that meets the requirements of § 5-706 of this subtitle and is designated as a focus area by the Secretary under § 5-706 of this subtitle.
"Political subdivision" means a county or municipal corporation.
